Package adventure_game.items

Interface Consumable

All Known Implementing Classes:
HealingPotion, Portkey, RagePotion
public interface Consumable
Interface Consumable allows for the creation of consumable items like Health Potions. A Consumable implements the method consume() which manifests any of the effects of the consumable item

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void consume​(Character owner)
    Manifest any and all effects of this consumable item.
    String getName()
    gets the name

  • Method Details

    • consume

      void consume​(Character owner)
      Manifest any and all effects of this consumable item. For example, a Health Potion will increase the health of the Character consuming it.
      Parameters:
      owner - the Character consuming this item

    • getName

      String getName()
      gets the name
      Returns:
      name of consumable
